<template>

    <input type="email" required />

    data() {
        return {
            email: "";
        }
    }
};
</script>

<style>
form {
  max-width: 420px;

  text-align: left;

}
label {
  color: #aaa;
  display: inline-block;
  margin: 25px 0 15px;

  font-weight: bold;
}
input,
select {
  display: block;

  border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;
  color: #555;
}
